hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said "Five things are in accordance with Al Fitra (i.e. the tradition of prophets): to be circumcised, to shave the pelvic region, to pull out the hair of the armpits, to cut short the moustaches, and to clip the nails

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخِتَانِ بَعْدَ الْكِبَرِ وَنَتْفِ الإِبْطِ
chapter.eng-name: Circumcision at an old age, and pulling out armpit hair
